pr_title: Add support for async functions in funqy-knative

timeline.bodyText: Create a separate test for CompletionStage please, don't replace the old one.
timeline.author: patriot1burke

timeline.bodyText:
I think we need to require that the CompletionStage generic type be filled in.  Jackson Readers and Writers are initialized at static initialization time to speed up boot time for native.  I don't want to support dynamic marshalling of types.
The deployment code (@buildstep) should check that if it is a CompletionStage that the generic type is filled in.  Otherwise it should warn and abort the build.
timeline.author: patriot1burke

timeline.bodyText: Do not delete the old synchronous function.  Write a new test for CompletionStage<> return value.  Also, please duplicate the separate CompletionStage test in Lambda and HTTP.
